{{Infobox Radio station |image =| |name = ABC New England North West| |callsign = 2NU| |coordinates = {{Coord|31|05|38.11|S|150|56|01.29|E|type:landmark_scale:2000_region:AU}} |airdate = 9 November 1948 | |frequency = 648 [[Kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] New England
819 [[Kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Northern Tablelands
99.1 [[Megahertz|mHz]] [[frequency modulation|FM]] North West Slopes
101.9 [[Megahertz|mHz]] [[frequency modulation|FM]] Armidale| |area = [[New England (Australia)|New England, Australia]]| |owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | |format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | |website = [http://www.abc.net.au/newengland/ http://www.abc.net.au/newengland/]|}} '''ABC New England North West ''' is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Tamworth, New South Wales|Tamworth]] and broadcasting to the regions of [[New England (Australia)|New England]], the [[Northern Tablelands (New South Wales)|Northern Tablelands]] and [[North West Slopes (New South Wales)|North West Slopes]] in [[New South Wales]]. This includes the towns and cities of [[Armidale, New South Wales|Armidale]], [[Moree, New South Wales|Moree]], [[Tenterfield, New South Wales|Tenterfield]] and [[Glen Innes, New South Wales|Glen Innes]]. The station began as '''2NU''' in 1948 and is now heard on these main [[AM Broadcasting|AM]] and [[FM Broadcasting|FM]] frequencies along with a number of low-power FM repeaters: *'''2NU''' 648 AM *'''2GL''' 819 AM *'''2NWR''' 99.1 and 101.9 FM ==Local Programs== ===Weekdays=== *The Breakfast Show with Anna Moulder â 5:55 AM to 7:45 AM *Rural Report with Caitlin Furlong â 6:40 AM to 6:55 AM *The Morning Show with Kelly Fullerâ 8:30 AM to 11:00 AM ===Saturday=== *Saturday Breakfast with David Evans â 6:00 AM to 7:45 AM and 8:30 AM to 9:00 AM *From the Hill - sport with Mark Lowe â 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM When local programs are not broadcast the station is a relay of [[702 ABC Sydney]]. ==References== {{cite web |title=ABC New England North West - a history |url= http://www.abc.net.au/local/stories/2008/02/27/2174462.htm |date=2003-02-27 |accessdate=2008-06-05 |publisher=[[ABC Online]] }} ==See also== * [[List of Australian radio stations]] {{ABC Local Radio}} [[Category:Radio stations in New South Wales]] [[Category:Radio stations established in 1948]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc New England North West}}
